Participants.evidence: Subjects with unresectable isolated CRC liver metastases scheduled for HAI pump were eligible.

Intervention.evidence: IHP used fixed-dose oxaliplatin with escalating 5-FU doses.

Objective.evidence: This study determined the safety and maximum tolerated dose (MTD) of 5-FU with oxaliplatin via IHP.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Toxicity (CTCAE v 4.0) and response (RECIST), progression-free survival, and overall survival (OS) were assessed.

Number_Randomised.evidence: All 12 patients had received ≥1 line of pre-IHP chemotherapy.

Result_Outcome.evidence: At 6-month follow-up, 9 patients (82 %) demonstrated partial response, while 2 (18 %) exhibited stable disease.

Harms.evidence: There were 4 grade 3 serious adverse events (33.3 %) and 1 grade 4 event (8.3 %).
